structure.unit: Jurisdiction And Emblems Of The Commonwealth, The General Court, Statutes And Public Documents

law.catch_line: Compensation Of Members Chosen To Fill Vacancies Or Who Resign
law.text: Each member of the general court chosen to fill a vacancy, or who resigns his seat during a regular annual session, shall be entitled to a per diem compensation for the time of his membership at the rate provided in section nine, and the allowances for travel and other expenses for the time of his membership as provided in section nine B.
